item.title: [508] How do you make a bow special method? (codes included)
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Okayw ell I need to make a special method for my dark bow and this is what I have to far…

} else if (p.equipment[3] == 11235 && p.specialAmount >= 50) { // Dark Bow p.usingSpecial = false; p.specialAmount -= 50; p.requestAnim(424, 0); p.requestGFX(1099, 100); p.requestGFX(1101, 100); p2.appendHit(Misc.random(42), 0); p.usingSpecial = false; p.frames.sendMessage(p,"You don't have enough special energy.");

But see, it’s not a bow one because it would say like create projectile or something like that. If you have Dark Bow special could you please tell me what to do.

Read full topic
